lines.text: Why do I have a gut feeling that there's not much interest in the police department in finding the two men who attacked me?
Miss Wells, we want to catch these guys but there are more criminals than there are police, and nobody wants to hire more cops.
Do you know what the most dangerous parts of the city are?
Why?
So I can be safe when I go jogging.
Well stay away from Hell's Kitchen, that's why they call it that.
Any children?
No, you?
I had one.
You *had* one?
She was a hit and run victim, she was only 4 years old.
They never got the driver?
No.
Can I see a Walter P32?
[is shown one]
Just like the one my father gave me for my 14th birthday.
That's an unusual present to give a 14 year old.
We were at the military post.
[Detective Lowery has just found the dum-dum bullets in Valarie's desk drawyer when she walks in and he notices the fresh slash wounds on both of her upper arms]
I didn't know those animals cut your shoulders too.
It wasn't "those" animals who cut my shoulders.
